original_title: The Long Search: Buddhism: The Land of the Disappearing Buddha
overview: If the Buddha of India met the Buddha of Japan, would they recognize each other? To find out, this program talks to the staff in a Tokyo restaurant who keep regular Zen meditation schedules as part of their job, then on to the classical Zen calligraphy, swordfighting, archery and tea ceremony.
title: The Long Search: Buddhism: The Land of the Disappearing Buddha
